description: Table of carryless products i * j, i>=0, j>=0, read by antidiagonals.
links: David Applegate, Marc LeBrun and N. J. A. Sloane, Carryless Arithmetic (I): The Mod 10 Version.
Index entries for sequences related to carryless arithmetic
crossrefs: Cf. A001477 for carryless 1 X n, A004520 for carryless 2 X 10 base 10, A055120 for carryless 9 X n, A008592 for carryless 10 X n.
author: _Henry Bottomley_, Feb 19 2001
extensions: Minor edits by _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 24 2010
